title: SLT-MOBITEL clinches Infrastructure and Utilities accolade at National Business Excellence Awards 2021
body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider clinched the Runner-up accolade in the Infrastructure and Utilities category at the National Business Excellence Awards 2021 (NBEA). Organised by the National Chamber of Commerce, Sri Lanka, the NBEA 2021 was held at the BMICH recently .

The annual award, pioneered by the Chamber since 2004, recognises excellence in businesses and entities that contribute to the country’s socioeconomic development. SLT-MOBITEL winning the award reaffirms its commitment to business excellence and international best practices.
